backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all game entity types, core maps, and state holders for profiles, combat, clans, dungeons, bots, and social systems.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy types and state structures used to upgrade stored data between versions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme variables and dark-mode styling for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing authentication, routing between all pages, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login flow, showing loading and login UI, and gates children until authenticated.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Provides the main game layout with navigation, header, footer, and logout handling based on user profile.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Displays a dialog for creating a new player profile with a single action button.
frontend/src/components/ProgressionPanel: Shows a survivor's level, experience progress, and core stats with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, survivors, and game actions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin tools page allowing currency grants, unlocking killers, setting levels, and managing weapons, pets, and events using multiple query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Displays all announcements and lets admins create new ones with title and message fields.
frontend/src/pages/ClansPage.tsx: Shows clan marketplace, join listings, and supports creating listings, forming clans, and joining clans or random ones.
frontend/src/pages/DungeonPage.tsx: Lists dungeons and quests, letting players start and complete quests and unlock crates with rewards.
frontend/src/pages/GameplayPage.tsx: Handles combat against preset enemies and bots, managing attacks, magic, and ongoing combat states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing profile stats, survivor status, and navigation cards for gameplay sections.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Displays weapons and pets from the user profile with options to equip items.
frontend/src/pages/KillersPage.tsx: Shows killer progression, stats, and allows unlocking the next killer in sequence.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shop interface for purchasing items and the admin panel using in‑game currency.
frontend/src/pages/SocialPage.tsx: Social system for following, unfollowing, and viewing followers, following, and friends.
frontend/src/pages/SurvivorsPage.tsx: Displays the user's survivors, allows setting an active survivor, and provides a dialog form for creating new survivors with custom stats.
frontend/src/pages/UpdatesPage.tsx: Shows a static list of recent game updates with version info, dates, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, persisting them across navigation, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current game concept, features, requirements, and architectural notes for development tracking.
